songs.title: Boy Like You
songs.lyrics:
[Hook]
What do I do with a boy like you
Like, like you, what do I do with you?
(Oh-oh, oh-oh) what do I do
With a boy like you
What do I do with a boy like you?
(Like, like you)

[Verse 1]
I know you know, I'm wrapped around your finger
You're so, you're so beautiful and dangerous
Hot and cold, don't you see the light, boy
I could blow your mind, boy, let me be your new toy

[Pre-Chorus]
I do what I want and I get what I want
When I want it (w-want it, w-want it)
So I'm not gonna stop 'til I get what you got
'Til I got it (g-got it, g-got it)

[Chorus]
What do I do with a boy, with a boy like you
Got me lost, got me hooked, now I'm so confused
Was this a part of your plan?
I don't really understand what to do
What to do with a boy like you
(Oh-oh, oh-oh) with a boy like you
(Oh-oh, oh-oh) with a boy like you

[Verse 2]
I'm gonna win, boy your game is over
Try to play, but your odds are 10 to 1
Keep the change, after I'm done with ya'
You won't know what hit ya'
You're not fooling anyone

[Pre-Chorus]
I do what I want and I get what I want
When I want it (w-want it, w-want it)
So I'm not gonna stop 'til I get what you got
'Til I got it (g-got it, g-got it)

[Chorus]
What do I do with a boy, with a boy like you
Got me lost, got me hooked, now I'm so confused
Was this a part of your plan?
I don't really understand what to do
What to do with a boy like you

[Hook]
What do I do with a boy like you
Like, like you, what do I do with you
(Oh-oh, oh-oh) like you
What do I do with a boy like you
What do I do with a boy like you
Like you, what do I do with you
(Oh-oh, oh-oh) like you
What do I, what-what do I do

[Chorus]
What do I do with a boy, with a boy like you
Got me lost, got me hooked, now I'm so confused
Was this a part of your plan?
I don't really understand what to do
What to do with a boy like you
What do I do with a boy, with a boy like you
Got me lost, got me hooked, now I'm so confused
Was this a part of your plan?
I don't really understand what to do
What to do with a boy like you

[Outro]
What do I do with a boy like you
Like, like you, what do I do with you
(Oh-oh, oh-oh) With a boy like you
What do I do with a boy like you
Like, like you, what do I do with you
What do I do with a boy like you
Like you, with a boy like you
With a boy like you
With a boy, with a boy like you
